name: Drowning
description: Walk in the shoes of this teenage boy who learns to live with his inner demon.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Dedicated Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core CPU or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Dedicated Memory Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatable
